title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor (1GKWVMA)
description: When exporting a Zip file in a workspace with many projects, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds) to update the checked state of the table. During this process, a busy cursor should be shown to indicate that the system is working. Currently, no busy cursor is displayed.
OB: When exporting a Zip file, it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds) to update the checked state of the table. However, no busy cursor is shown during this process.
EB: When exporting a Zip file, it should show a busy cursor while updating the checked state of the table.
SR: To replicate this issue: 1. Open a workspace with many projects. 2. Go to the export Zip option. 3. Select all projects. 4. Choose some file types. 5. Press ok.
